name: Manor Madness
storyline:
Ghustav, a young ghost, attends Polterhigh, the most prestigious school for poltergeisting. In the course Manor Madness, he will learn what it means to be a poltergeist and what abilities are at his disposal. In each class, your goal is to scare all the humans out of your assigned manor.
Currently on sale, the manor is frequented by humans interested in buying the building and a realtor trying his best to sell the house. He needs to get creative in finding excuses for your spooky shenanigans.
summary: In Manor Madness you take on the role of the ghost Ghustav and unleash mayhem. Ghustav has been accepted to the most prestigious school of Polter High where they will study how to possess objects and fling them across the room. Of course, traditional haunting can't be missed. Turn on any electrical appliances, flick the light switch, or play a spooky tune.
